The doctor's experience and pleasing nature made our visits pleasant¬†Now one of my daughters is currently wearing ceramic braces and the gentle support from the doctors was phenomenal.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Impaction / Impacted Tooth Extraction,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review:
Dr Shruthy is truly a modern day professional. Got the exact diagnoses without knowing my history during the first consultation. Xray was advised and surgery was planned and explained to me very clearly and was done two days later. 

After a year or so of being afraid to get my decaying wisdom teeth removed, was finally able to get it done. I felt no pain during the process and the instructions given post surgery helped me recover and be at ease. Made two visits to clinic after surgery. Post surgery follow up and care at this clinic and by the Dr is great. 

Staff is very friendly and the clinic is clean. Will recommend Shruthy and True Dental Care to people I know. Especially ones who are scared to go to a dentist. Planning to take my mom next and have personal checkups here from now.
reply_text: Thanku so much for ur kind wordsüòÄ

review:
I am an NRI and had severe tooth pain for the past few weeks and had to consult a dentist at my home town Chennai.  So my wife used Practo to find me a good Dentist and she suggested Dr.Shruthy.

My first appointment was smooth and Doctor explained clearly what needs to be done and recommended for the wisdom tooth removal as it was giving me lot of pain.

Never in my lifetime I had to go thru tooth extraction and I was very afraid of the procedure but Doctor Shruthy gave me the right confidence for the procedure and I ended up taking not one but two teeth‚Äôs :-) To be honest I had zero pain during the whole procedure and I am so grateful to my doctor. 

I will 200% recommend Dr.Shruthy to anyone and would surely consult with her for any of my future treatments for myself and to my whole family ‚ò∫Ô∏è

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had to do my first root canal and was not sure of a good place in Chennai. Very glad that my friend suggested me this place.
The Doctor is just amazing. She ensured to explain me every detail of the process and do the root canal with the minimum pain possible. Personally, being terrified of teeth treatment, i would go to her any day because of how comfortable she made me feel during the procedure.
Furthermore, the clinic is super clean which is not usually the cases in the other places I have visited.
Prices are very reasonable and i doubt any other place in Chennai can provide such exceptional service at such affordable prices.

review: Excellent,marvelous and fantasticprecious doctor. Will recommend for dental procedures. Hygienic practice

Found this doctor after searching for years for a good dentist and was never this comfortable. *** ******* ** **** ************ *** patiently listens to your problems. I had a bleeding gum and Dr. Shruthy immediately diagonised the problem and made a treatment plan. I followed as advised and saved my gums and teeth.  The LASER dentistry she practices make her unique in this area and is absolutely painless. Dr. Shruthy would be my first choice going forward. Highly recommended!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have been consulting Shruthi ma'am since 2020. She is friendly, patient and at the same time very skillful in handling the dental issue. She ensures the procedure is painless and at the same time effective. She not only explains the issue, but the mode of treatment as well.

 I have had two root canals so far and my dental health has improved considerably due to flossing technique taught by her.

review: I am extremely satisfied with TRUE Dental care. I felt very comfortable and it was really painless throughout the procedure.. I underwent root canal treatment and laser treatment. All procedures were explained in detail very calmly  by Dr Shruthy and she was very friendly. I would suggest true dental care for all dental related issues.

Doctor was very patient in listening. My mom had a trouble because of an infected tooth and she had swelling all over her cheek. Dr. Shruthy was very polite in her conversations and she explained the root cause and the preferred treatment very neatly. She handled my mom very patiently as she had lot of fear of pain induced during root canal. I would recommend Dr. Shruthy for any dental related problems.

Thank you doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was quite surprised when the doctor mentioned such pocket friendly fee for tooth extraction and cleaning. Common on..we live in a day and age where we pay 1000 just for a pedicure whilst for the gruesome tartar deposit cleaning and scaling the doctor charged just Rs 800. My wisdom tooth was too brittle and had to be broken into pieces for extraction. The doctor again spent almost an hour fighting with the decayed tooth and pulled it out reassuring me every minute that it was going to be alright. She is indeed a very honest and thorough professional. Highly recommended.
reply_text: Thanku so much for your valuable feedback mamüôÇ
